title: SaltsR
text: SaltsR package provides application test calculations. interactive tool allows evaluate package’s output using ion chromatography data. launch application, simply run following command R: open SaltsR application, can input ion chromatography data explore package’s functionality.

title: SaltsR
text: Use function following inputs perform salt balance. full outputs function shown underneath.
code: fun_salt_balance(sample_name = "Pathway 2",                  dry_g = 0.801,                  water_ml = 100,                  chloride_ppm = 14.651,                  nitrate_ppm = 17.339,                  sulfate_ppm = 39.923,                  sodium_ppm = 2.027,                  potassium_ppm = 2.04,                  calcium_ppm = 49.809,                  magnesium_ppm = 0.581) fun_salt_balance(sample_name = "Pathway 2",                  dry_g = 0.801,                  water_ml = 100,                  chloride_ppm = 14.651,                  nitrate_ppm = 17.339,                  sulfate_ppm = 39.923,                  sodium_ppm = 2.027,                  potassium_ppm = 2.04,                  calcium_ppm = 49.809,                  magnesium_ppm = 0.581) |> dplyr::glimpse() title: Authors and Citation
text: Bhavesh Shah. Author, maintainer. Sebastiaan Godts. Author. Scott Orr. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Shah B, Godts S, Orr S (2024). SaltsR: SaltsR - Tools analysis salt formation data. R package version 0.1.0, https://bhavshah01.github.io/SaltsR/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {SaltsR: SaltsR - Tools for the analysis of salt formation data},   author = {Bhavesh Shah and Sebastiaan Godts and Scott Orr},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://bhavshah01.github.io/SaltsR/}, }

what: SaltsR - Tools for the analysis of salt formation data
title: SaltsR - Tools for the analysis of salt formation data
text: SaltsR data science tool aid scientists, researchers, conservators managers cultural heritage interested protecting heritage salt weathering. KIK-IRPA PREDICT: https://predict.kikirpa./ Details calculation: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-022-01445-9 Salt Wiki: https://www.saltwiki.net/index.php/Home ECOS – RUNSALT : http://science.sdf-eu.org/runsalt/ MDCS / Monument Diagnosis Conservation System : https://mdcs.monumentenkennis.nl/

title: SaltsR - Tools for the analysis of salt formation data
